entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tracadie-Sheila
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
